comments.body:
I think `react-dom` is a completely separate package from React and is already published here https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/react-dom/react-dom.d.ts 

I also suggest changing the name to `react-dom` instead what's here now. Basically I would recommend splitting out all of the modules into separate packages to match NPM.
See #5828 for a discussion on this.
